column5: Just wondering what the status of the proposed new mine near Emo was. It was on the news a few(?) years ago, haven't heard anything on it? It's been a long winter. Bill
I believe it's been up and running for awhile now. We've passed trucks turning off 17 just north of Emo for a couple of years now. (or at least in 2019). :-)

Pretty big deal for Gearldton. Im thinking a motel room is going to be hard to get, Their moving hwy 11 closer to Gearldton The gas station at 11 and 548 was already closed up last fall. google new greenstone mine theirs lots of info on this huge project.
